text: 2. The greatest integer of a real number z denoted by [z] is the largest integer less than or equal to z, so z satisfies [z] <@ < [z]+1. The greatest integer of z s also called the integral part of z. The fractional part of a real number z denoted {z} is the difference between z and the largest integer less than or equal to z, i.e. {z} =z — [x]. Write down the values of [—1/4], {8/5}, {7}, [22/7), {=22/7}, [5/4), [-11/4], {-1/3}. 4pts
